title: Maintenance in all servers
body: This message is for all divisions of the bureau.  Starting today, the servers may suffer instability due to the latest maintenance mesures.            admin

title: Account Security
body: Attn. all agents: It has come to our attention that some of our agents are reusing their passwords elsewhere on the internet. The Technology Security Department would like to remind you that such reuse is a threat to the Bureau's internal security! In recognition of this fact, all current passwords issued to agents will expire at the end of the week. Remember: Passphrase Not Complexity!       admin

title: Depreciated Service
body: This is an automated message.   Please note that all future secure internal communications should be sent via your normal Buearu-approved mail client. This secure service will be maintained as low-priority          admin
